sub_title: Associate Professor at University of Maastricht

profile_positions.description:
Development and coordination of Problem-based Learning (PBL) modules in bachelor and master of psychology, e.g. modules on Man-Machine interaction (1996-), Cognitive psychology (2002-), Organizational behavior (2005-), Decision Making (2009-2012), International Psychology (2013-), Entrepreneurship (2017-) and practical trainings (e.g., negotiation, creativity, crosscultural skills, persuasion, critical thinking; 1996-)
Managing various educational innovation projects at UM, e.g., integrating ICTtools in PBL (e.g. concept mapping (2007-2010), implementing PBL without tutor supervision in autonomous groups of students (2011-2012), implementing virtual mobility with students in Maastricht, Spain, Mozambique, Turkey and Indonesia (2010-)
Member of various educational innovation project groups: MaRBLe steering group (undergraduate research for excellent students (2009-2017); Leading in Learning (innovating PBL and improving climate for innovation at UM; 2009-2012); Learning and Working (blended learning solutions for working professionals); bachelor revision (2009-2010); developing and implementing UM MOOC on PBL (2014-2017); faculty liaison at Maastricht Centre for Education Innovation, EDLAB (2015-2017)

Coordinator Internationalisation at FPN; preparing joint degree programmes; member UM taskforce International Classroom (2011-)
Member UM Educational Advisory Council (2007-2013), UM Strategic Board Internationalization (2018-)

Consultancy/workshops (local and international) on PBL, innovative assessment; capacity building projects e.g. NICHE project “Introducing student-centered learning at Universidade Eduardo Mondlane” (2010-2015), Erasmus+ project LinkYou, fostering employability in South-America (2016-2019)
Education Prizes: Maastricht University, Faculty of Psychology (2001, 2004), Maastricht University Wijnand Wijnen Prize (2006), Reimagine Education 2015 Europe Silver Award.
Comenius Leadership Fellow (250k grant, 2019)
profile_positions.title: Associate Professor

profile_positions.description:
Lecturing, supervising and coaching (small groups of) students during research projects and writing theses (1993-present)
Development and coordination of various Problem-based Learning (PBL) modules in bachelor and master of psychology and honours program, including modules on Perception (1998-2003), Cognitive Science (1996-present), Persuasion (1997-2012), Computational Psychology (1997-1998;2005-2009), Cognitive psychology (2002-present), Critical Thinking (2003-2004) 
Coordination and design of progress test, Faculty of Psychology and Neuroscience (FPN), Maastricht University (UM) (1995-present)
Innovation
Various educational innovation projects at UM/FPN, including projects on introducing electronic portfolios (2001-2003), revitalising Problem-based Learning (PBL)  (2003-2004), developing training in critical thinking (2003-2004), designing master work and organizational psychology from a cognitive and biological perspective (2004-2005)
Other roles
Chair/Member Test Review Committee, Faculty of Psychology, Maastricht University (1999-2003; 2005-2015)
Coordinator master Work and Organizational Psychology (2004-present)
Member Faculty Council (1996-1997)
Member Educational committee, Faculty of Psychology and Neuroscience (2002-2012)
Member Education Management Team, Faculty Of Psychology and Neuroscience (1997-2000; 2015-present)
